events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I would like to return it for a full refund.
The request was reviewed and categorized under the refund cluster to proceed correctly with the return process.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist you with the refund and return procedure.
Hello! Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return in detail?
To process your refund, please confirm the order number and tell us if the item has been opened or used.
My order number is 3287641, and the product was unopened but did not meet my expectations, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. We will send you a return shipping label shortly, and once we receive the item, we will refund your payment.
Thanks for your help and clear instructions. I appreciate the fast response and look forward to receiving the label so I can send the item back.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please use it to send back the product within the next 14 days to complete your refund process.
We are checking in to see if you have been able to send the product back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
The return was received, and your refund has been processed successfully. We are closing the case now, and thank you for your cooperation.
